summary: For when just finding gems in every urn and chest isn't enough.
descriptionHtml:
For when you feel like any of the following:
[list][*][size=2]Being a cheating shitlord[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Swimming in shiny rocks[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Taking things to ridiculous extremes[/size][/*]
[/list][size=2]This mod is there for you. What this mod does is adds Prowler's Profit gems to every respawning container in the game.

[/size]Yes, every one. As in barrels, satchels, sacks, wardrobes, end tables, [i]everything[/i].*

[size=1]* May not actually include every container; if you find one that doesn't work correctly, make sure the cell reloads properly and send me a message about it if it still doesn't spawn gems. Does not include non-respawning containers, quest containers, or things that aren't containers such as NPCs.

[/size](Since I wasn't originally intending to upload this, I made it to encompass all the major mods and DLC I use that add new containers; as such, [b]this requires Falskaar and Nchuzzrezar, and all DLC.[/b])
author: Zaerosz
